Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9x13-inch baking pan.
Combine flour, brown sugar, granulated sugar, butter, and salt in a bowl until the mixture is crumbly. Set aside 1 cup of this mixture for later use.

Combine buttermilk, eggs, and baking soda with the crumbly mixture until the batter is smooth. Transfer the batter into the greased baking dish. Sprinkle the reserved crumbly mixture on top of the batter, and then add a layer of cinnamon.
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, taking about 45 to 50 minutes.
